structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Protective Services Provided To Critical Witnesses; Notice To Defense Counsel

text.section: any necessary armed protection or escort, marked or unmarked surveillance or periodic visits or contact by law enforcement officials prior, during or subsequent to a criminal proceeding;
physical relocation to an alternate shelter, housing or residence;
transportation or storage of personal possessions;
petition for a protective order on any individual identified as a threat to a critical witness.
